name: Flying or Dying
description:
Time flies by - For some it's more than a phrase. And for some others it can be quite a hard lifestyle if they have only ten seconds to survive!

In Flying or Dying, you control a bold little fly that found its way into a restaurant. Its objective: Feast on anything that looks like a quick snack! In a restaurant, there's lots to explore for a tiny little fly. Find out for yourself!
